page.title: 09BELMONT BROWNIES
page.content: One of the{clubs}which is open to girls in Belmont is the{Brownies. Altogether there are seven in the group and two{leaders.}They come to school on a Tuesday at 6.30. and finish at 8.00.Every week they bring twenty pence for subscriptions. Since 1984 six Brownies have moved up to the Guides.Last year they helped to buy the school computer.They have also bought two bricks for the village church because it was falling down.They have been helping Sri Lanka for the past three months and have raised forty pounds.Before helping Sri Lanka they helped Nigeria and raised thirty pounds for bandages.Also they make presents for their parents and papier mache toys.They sometimes go to {parades}and meet other packs.They play games such as cat and mouse,dodge ball and weather man.
